testcase.name: Verifying the number of clients
testcase.system-out: Given user hits get all cleints API "/api/myaccount/clients" "true" "1" "4".passed Then user verfies that total number of clients should be "4"................passed

testcase.name: Verifying the offer benefits on homepage
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cashwise application.......................................passed When user scrolls down to four offer benefits on homepage...................passed Then user should see all four options of the offer benefits.................passed

testcase.name: Verifying the login with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cashwise application.......................................passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed When user logs in "test" and "test".........................................passed Then user should land on "https://cashwise.us/main?showLogin=true" page.....passed

testcase.name: Verifying the login with invalid credentials - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cashwise application.......................................passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed When user logs in "hi@test.com" and "test"..................................passed Then user should land on "https://cashwise.us/main?showLogin=true" page.....passed

testcase.name: Verifying the error message for negative login - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cashwise application.......................................passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed When user logs in "test@gmail.com" and "test"...............................passed Then user sees error messages "" and "Password must be at least 6 characters".passed

testcase.name: Verifying the error message for negative login - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cashwise application.......................................passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed When user logs in "test" and "test123"......................................passed Then user sees error messages "Please enter a valid email address" and ""...passed

testcase.name: Verifying the error message for negative login - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cashwise application.......................................passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed When user logs in "test" and "test".........................................passed Then user sees error messages "Please enter a valid email address" and "Password must be at least 6 characters".passed

testcase.classname: Demo Blaze add to Cart feature
testcase.name: Verification of product adding to Cart - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on the product "Iphone 6 32gb"..............................passed When user clicks add to cart button.........................................passed Then user sees "Product added" message on alert and clicks ok...............passed And user clicks on Cart button..............................................passed Then user verifies the details of the added product.........................passed

testcase.name: Verifying the login functionality positive
testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on log in button for demoblaze..............................passed When user enters credentials "codewise" and "test" and clicks login.........passed Then user should successfully login to application..........................passed

testcase.name: Verifying account sign up - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on sign up button...........................................passed When user enters credentials "test" and "" and clicks sign up...............passed Then user should see alert message "Please fill out Username and Password.".passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on sign up button...........................................passed When user enters credentials "" and "test" and clicks sign up...............passed Then user should see alert message "Please fill out Username and Password.".passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on sign up button...........................................passed When user enters credentials "" and "" and clicks sign up...................passed Then user should see alert message "Please fill out Username and Password.".passed

testcase.name: Verifying account sign up - Example #1.4
testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on sign up button...........................................passed When user enters credentials "test" and "test" and clicks sign up...........passed Then user should see alert message "This user already exist."...............passed

testcase.name: Verifying account sign up - Example #1.5
testcase.system-out: Given user is on demo blaze application.....................................passed And user clicks on sign up button...........................................passed When user enters credentials "placeholder" and "test" and clicks sign up....passed Then user should see alert message "Sign up successful."....................passed
